cast.overview: In the late 1990s, the arrival of elderly invalid Patrick into Marion and Tom’s home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previous: the passionate relationship between Tom and Patrick at a time when homosexuality was illegal.
cast.title: My Policeman

details.biography: Sarah Lockett is an acclaimed actress which has starred in many films and TV series, more recently in (Big Ben, 2024), (When the Withered Leaf Awakens, 2024) & (May I Call you Agnes? 2024). Sarah was previously a broadcast journalist, anchor and reporter inter alia for BBC News, Sky News, Channel 4 News, ITN, Reuters. Follow her at Instagram, X, Linkedin and IMDB.
details.name: Sarah Lockett
